Walk the stack trace yourself, frame by frame, unfortunately.

So said Steve Kelem on 3/11/2003 --------------------
Well, do you, or does anyone else, know how to disable truncation of
the output?  I've tried searching the web, but there are too many
things that match "stack trace" and "truncate".

Steve

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
> I believe JDK 1.4.1 is doing thing, and not JUnit or Ant. I maybe be
wrong.
> 
> So said Steve Kelem on 3/11/2003 --------------------
> Does anyone know how to keep the stack trace from getting truncated
when 
> running JUnit tests?
